directions: Before washing ½ kg fish finger, coat it with 2 tbsp vinegar and leave for 5 minutes.
Then wash and leave it in the sieve to let drain excess water.
Coat them with 2 lemon juice and salt and leave it for a while.
In a bowl, mix ½ cup flour, ½ cup cornflour and 1 tsp baking powder.
In another bowl, beat 2-3 egg whites well.
Now coat fish fingers first in dry mixture, then dip in egg whites and roll on 1 packet bread crumbs.
Deep fry them until golden brown.
title: Fish Fingers
